info.name: onlineshop
info.description:
- set variable named token and set its value 
and in Auth tab set api key named token and set value to token variable and add it to header

request.description:
## Admin me REQ
- url : /admin/me

- shows admin own profile 
-verifying by token

##  Create Admin  REQ

- admin with permission of creating users can userthis api and add new admin.
if admin doesnt have this permission, will get "not allowed" error

- root with role_id=1 has all permissions

### required :
    "username":
    "email": 
    "phone":
    "activityStatus":
    "password":
    "roleId":

## Admin edit REQ

- admin with permission of editing admins can use this api and edit admin.
if admin doesnt have this permission, will get "not allowed" error

- root with role_id=1 has all permissions

### optional:
    "username":
    "email": 
    "phone":
    "activityStatus":
    "password":
    "roleId":

header.value: OPTIONS, GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE

request.description:
## Admin edit own profile REQ

- admin can edit their own profile


### optional:
    "username":
    "email": 
    "phone":
    "password":

header.value: OPTIONS, GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE

request.description:
## Admin delete REQ

- admin with permission of deleting admins can use this api and delete admin.
if admin doesnt have this permission, will get "not allowed" error

- root with role_id=1 has all permissions

### requires:
   id : admin id

header.value: OPTIONS, GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE

request.description:
## Admin list REQ

- admin with permission of indexing admins can use this api and index admins.
if admin doesnt have this permission, will get "not allowed" error

- root with role_id=1 has all permissions

### required:
  -  size
  -  page

list/:size/:page

- size: number of indexes
- page : number of page

header.value: OPTIONS, GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE

request.description:
##  Create Role REQ

- admin with permission of creating Role can use this api and add new Role .
if admin doesnt have this permission, will get "not allowed" error

- root with role_id=1 has all permissions

### required :
  "role":

## Role list REQ

- admin with permission of indexing admins can use this api and index roles.
if admin doesnt have this permission, will get "not allowed" error

- root with role_id=1 has all permissions

### required:
  -  size
  -  page

list/:size/:page

- size: number of indexes
- page : number of page

##  Create brand REQ

- admin with permission of creating brands can userthis api 
if admin doesnt have this permission, will get "not allowed" error

- root with role_id=1 has all permissions

### required :
    "name":

### optional:

    "photo":

item.name: get comments of a product Copy

request.description:
- 999: number of indexes in page
- 0: page number

### filter for indexing commments:optional
visible :1
index visible comments
visible:0
index invisible comments

productd: comments for specefic product
